mapper.select: select * from t_ship_load_port where SHIP_LOAD_PORT_ID=#{shipLoadPortId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_load_port where uuid=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_load_port where SHIP_CONFIRMATION_SHEET_ID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_load_port where ALIVE_FLAG='1' and SHIP_CONFIRMATION_SHEET_ID=#{confId}
select * from t_ship_load_port where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_load_port where SHIP_LOAD_PORT_ID=#{conSellerId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_load_port where SHIP_CONFIRMATION_SHEET_ID=#{shipConfirmationSheetId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
